data.actual_result: Backspacing will stop short just at the first :, sometimes will stop mid emoji name or after the second : command. You would have to keep tapping backspace to delete everything.
data.expected_result: All text will delete, including : command in beginning without stopping.
data.short_description: Long pressing backspace interrupted by commands menu.
data.steps_to_repro: - Start by typing :, as if you are attempting to manually insert an emoji to text - Put in some text as if you are attempting to type an emoji, try to use actual words instead of spam or gibberish.- After typing the words (or actually tapping an emoji from drop down menu), hold backspace
